data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Guayas, Ecuador to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Guayas, Ecuador
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 385,391 believers in Guayas to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Guayas, Ecuador so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Guayas, Ecuador today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Guayas, Ecuador to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Guayas, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Guayas, Ecuador has a population of 3,645,500.

We estimate Guayas has 385,391 people who might know Jesus, 3,030,242 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 229,867 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 3,645,500 souls in Guayas and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
